commenter_a: Trump, regardless of what people who don't even know you say, I believe you're a good man & have good intentions for this country. Don't get sucked into what the government or anyone else wants you to do. You've called on Jesus to be your Lord & Savior & I'm proud of you for that because I know that the moment I did, He changed my life forever. Seek Him & all He is & He will give you all of your hearts desires. He's God, all His riches & glory will never compare to money, just stay focused on the Lord & you've got this! Trust me. He loves you.
